title: Teacher! May I go to the bathroom?
story: Teacher! May I go to the bathroom? Class is over in 5 minutes, Donna. Can I go then? Yes, you can, Donna. I don't know if I can hold it. If you can't, then go, dear. I think I can go in a few minutes. Thank you, Donna.
summary: A short dialogue between a student and a teacher about going to the bathroom before the end of the class.
image: An image of a student raising their hand in a classroom.
